mapper.insert: insert into diary(student_id, emoji, emotion, text, image, tags, create_time,consecutive_days) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{emoji}, #{emotion}, #{text}, #{image}, #{tags}, #{createTime},#{consecutiveDays})
mapper.select: select * from diary where student_id=#{currentId} and create_time=#{createTime}
select count(*) from diary where student_id=#{studentId}
select * from diary where student_id=#{studentId} order by create_time desc limit 1
select * from diary where student_id=#{studentId} order by create_time limit #{days}
